    92‚Üíexport class AudioConverterService {
    93‚Üí  async convertToLinear16Wav(options: ConvertAudioOptions): Promise<ConvertAudioResult> {
    94‚Üí    const { inputPath } = options;
    95‚Üí    if (!fs.existsSync(inputPath)) {
    96‚Üí      return { success: false, error: `Input file not found: ${inputPath}` };
    97‚Üí    }
    98‚Üí
    99‚Üí    const sampleRate = options.sampleRate ?? 16_000;
   100‚Üí    const outputDir = options.outputDir ?? this.getDefaultOutputDir();
   101‚Üí    const basename = options.outputBasename ?? randomUUID();
   102‚Üí    const outputPath = path.join(outputDir, `${basename}.wav`);
   103‚Üí
   104‚Üí    await fs.promises.mkdir(outputDir, { recursive: true });
   105‚Üí
   106‚Üí    return new Promise<ConvertAudioResult>((resolve) => {
   107‚Üí      ffmpeg(inputPath)
   108‚Üí        .audioCodec('pcm_s16le')
   109‚Üí        .audioChannels(1)
   110‚Üí        .audioFrequency(sampleRate)
   111‚Üí        .format('wav')
   112‚Üí        .on('end', async () => {
   113‚Üí          try {
   114‚Üí            const duration = await this.getDurationSeconds(outputPath);
   115‚Üí            resolve({ success: true, outputPath, durationSeconds: duration });
   116‚Üí          } catch (error) {
   117‚Üí            resolve({
   118‚Üí              success: true,
   119‚Üí              outputPath,
   120‚Üí              error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Failed to read duration'
   121‚Üí            });
   122‚Üí          }
   123‚Üí        })
   124‚Üí        .on('error', (error) => {
   125‚Üí          resolve({
   126‚Üí            success: false,
   127‚Üí            error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Audio conversion failed'
   128‚Üí          });
   129‚Üí        })
   130‚Üí        .save(outputPath);
   131‚Üí    });
   132‚Üí  }
   133‚Üí
   134‚Üí  async prepareLinear16Wav(options: PrepareAudioOptions): Promise<ConvertAudioResult> {
   135‚Üí    const outputDir = options.outputDir ?? this.getDefaultOutputDir();
   136‚Üí    const basename = options.outputBasename ?? randomUUID();
   137‚Üí    const targetPath = path.join(outputDir, `${basename}.wav`);
   138‚Üí    await fs.promises.mkdir(outputDir, { recursive: true });
   139‚Üí
   140‚Üí    if (options.inputPath === targetPath) {
   141‚Üí      return { success: true, outputPath: targetPath };
   142‚Üí    }
   143‚Üí
   144‚Üí    return this.convertToLinear16Wav({
   145‚Üí      inputPath: options.inputPath,
   146‚Üí      outputDir,
   147‚Üí      outputBasename: basename,
   148‚Üí      sampleRate: options.sampleRate
   149‚Üí    });
   150‚Üí  }
   151‚Üí
   152‚Üí  async extractLinear16Segment(options: ExtractSegmentOptions): Promise<ExtractSegmentResult> {
   153‚Üí    const { inputPath, startTime } = options;
   154‚Üí    if (!fs.existsSync(inputPath)) {
   155‚Üí      return { success: false, error: `Input file not found: ${inputPath}` };
   156‚Üí    }
   157‚Üí
   158‚Üí    const sampleRate = options.sampleRate ?? 16_000;
   159‚Üí    const outputDir = options.outputDir ?? this.getDefaultOutputDir();
   160‚Üí    const basename = options.outputBasename ?? `${randomUUID()}-segment`;
   161‚Üí    const outputPath = path.join(outputDir, `${basename}.wav`);
   162‚Üí
   163‚Üí    await fs.promises.mkdir(outputDir, { recursive: true });
   164‚Üí
   165‚Üí    const duration = options.endTime !== undefined ? Math.max(options.endTime - startTime, 0) : undefined;
   166‚Üí
   167‚Üí    return new Promise<ExtractSegmentResult>((resolve) => {
   168‚Üí      let command = ffmpeg(inputPath)
   169‚Üí        .seekInput(Math.max(startTime, 0))
   170‚Üí        .audioCodec('pcm_s16le')
   171‚Üí        .audioChannels(1)
   172‚Üí        .audioFrequency(sampleRate)
   173‚Üí        .format('wav');
   174‚Üí
   175‚Üí      if (duration !== undefined && Number.isFinite(duration) && duration > 0) {
   176‚Üí        command = command.duration(duration);
   177‚Üí      }
   178‚Üí
   179‚Üí      command
   180‚Üí        .on('end', async () => {
   181‚Üí          try {
   182‚Üí            const segmentDuration = await this.getDurationSeconds(outputPath);
   183‚Üí            resolve({ success: true, outputPath, durationSeconds: segmentDuration });
   184‚Üí          } catch (error) {
   185‚Üí            resolve({
   186‚Üí              success: true,
   187‚Üí              outputPath,
   188‚Üí              error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Failed to read segment duration'
   189‚Üí            });
   190‚Üí          }
   191‚Üí        })
   192‚Üí        .on('error', (error) => {
   193‚Üí          resolve({
   194‚Üí            success: false,
   195‚Üí            error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Audio segment extraction failed'
   196‚Üí          });
   197‚Üí        })
   198‚Üí        .save(outputPath);
   199‚Üí    });
   200‚Üí  }
   201‚Üí
   202‚Üí  private getDefaultOutputDir(): string {
   203‚Üí    const tempDir = path.join(app.getPath('temp'), 'meeting-recorder', 'stt-temp');
   204‚Üí    return tempDir;
   205‚Üí  }
   206‚Üí
   207‚Üí  private getDurationSeconds(filePath: string): Promise<number> {
   208‚Üí    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
   209‚Üí      ffmpeg.ffprobe(filePath, (error, metadata) => {
   210‚Üí        if (error) {
   211‚Üí          reject(error);
   212‚Üí          return;
   213‚Üí        }
   214‚Üí        const duration = metadata.format?.duration ?? 0;
   215‚Üí        resolve(duration);
   216‚Üí      });
   217‚Üí    });
   218‚Üí  }
   219‚Üí}
